concept.title: Validating File Downloads, Exit Links, and Custom Links
concept.shortdesc: To fully validate download, exit, and custom links, Adobe recommends using a packet analyzer to examine the links in real-time.

conbody.p: File downloads, exit links, and custom links are not page views, so the DigitalPulse Debugger tool cannot be used to verify parameters and variable settings. You must use a to view track link data.
